body_html:
@yaroslavvb I run my model in spark with GPU machines. The problem is that tensorflow takes all memory, so there is no memory space for spark rdd. This is why I want to limit the fraction of memory.
K.set_session is kinda not working for this case. K.set_session works on only spark driver, not on workers.. So I want to set default in Tensorflow itself.
Is there any way to modify tensorflow source related to this and use it??
